text: Danilia angulosa is a species of sea snail, a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Chilodontidae. ==Description== The size of the shell varies between 7 mm and 9 mm. ==Distribution== This marine species occurs off the Philippines, New Caledonia, the Loyalty Islands, Fiji and Tonga ==References== ==External links== * angulosa Category:Gastropods described in 2005
title: Danilia angulosa
